product_name: Pearl Izumi SELECT Relaxed SL Tri Jersey - Men's
long_description: When you want a little more room to breathe after the swim, pull on the men's Pearl Izumi SELECT Relaxed SL Tri Jersey and speed off in comfort on your ride and run. SELECT Transfer In-R-Cool(R) fabric powered by Ice-fil(R) actually makes you feel 5 degrees cooler due to its fast moisture wicking and quick-drying properties. Semi-form fit is relaxed, not compressive. Direct-Vent panels excel at ventilation. 12 in. front zipper maximizes venting options. One easy-access envelope pocket holds an energy gel. Pearl Izumi SELECT Relaxed SL Tri Jersey for men features reflective elements for low-light visibility.
short_description: When you want a little more room to breathe after the swim, pull on the men's Pearl Izumi SELECT Relaxed SL Tri Jersey and speed off in comfort on your ride and run.
